CustomField.description: This field is required. It must be manually populated with a percentage number lower than 1 (such as .25) if there are multiple groups or with a percentage number equal to 1 if there is only one group. It is used to determine how much a particular group of risk grade factors contributes to the calculated risk grade. The weight across all risk grade groups for a risk grade template should not exceed 1.
CustomField.label: Weight
